Class AnswerDO

java.lang.Object
application.AnswerDO
public class AnswerDO extends Object
The AnswerDO (Data Object) class handles database operations related to answers.

This includes:

  • Creating, updating, and deleting answers
  • Reading all answers or solution-only answers
  • Sorting answers based on reviewer trust weights
